title: Master Yi - Tank ?
body:
I played Yi and searched for a perfect build. I build Titanic, Warmogs, Frozen Malet, Righteous Glory, Black Cleaver and Cinderhulk ( for Jungle ) or Spirit Visage. It was only a joke but then i found out that this Yi is very strong. I would play him with Gasp of Undying.

Write you opinion about this.
